WRITING.TEXT: This is for my composition 2 class. You are right about the "why" part. Thanks for the help.

WRITING.TITLE: I am creating an academic argument on why hate crimes are faked, but I cannot find much research on the topic.
WRITING.TEXT: Can anyone give me any kind of resources I can use in my paper? My teacher does not want me to write about this because she does not believe they are even faked in the first place so I would like to inform her.
Watch me - Silento. No matter your age this is fun to dance to.

Reflections, The color clear: Pseudo. It reminds of when I lost people dear to me. It is a sad song, that brings back memories when I hear it. So I try not to listen to it since things are better now.
The legend of Zelda Majoras Mask
